question: What would be the growth rate of India in 2020-21, as projected by the Reserve Bank of India in its annual report?
explanation:
The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) has recently released its annual report 2019-20, in which it has estimated that India would have a negative growth of (-) 4.5 % for the year 2020-21.
The central bank has also projected the global growth rate between (-) 6.0 per cent and (-) 7.6 per cent. It also said that the supply of banknotes during 2019-20 was also lower by 23.3 % than that of the previous year.
